question: Hello my question is regarding the effect a liver transplant would have on someone with chronic pancreatitis. He is a recovering alcoholic and has not had a drink in since being diagnosised three years ago, he is 64 years old. title: Effect of Liver Transplant on a Patient with Chronic Pancreatis
